CHEWA-R.BK.summary: Chewathai Public Company Limited develops, rents, and sells residential projects in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Real Estate Business and Rental Business. The company develops and sells land, houses, townhomes, and residence condominium projects. It also owns, develops, and rents small and medium sized ready-built factories. The company was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Chewathai Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Chartchewa Co., Ltd.

KWG.BK.long_name: King Wai Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited
KWG.BK.summary: King Wai Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the property development business in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Real Estate Business, Rental and Service Business, and Non-Life Insurance Business. The company develops residential housing and condominium projects; and provides non-life insurance products, property management and agency services, advertising and marketing services, and rental and other services for its office space. It is also involved in the construction and trading activities. The company was formerly known as Keppel Thai Properties Public Company Limited and changed its name to King Wai Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited in June 2016. King Wai Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
